sentences.sContent: In turn, this prevents issues concerning corrosion, as the ductile material doesn't crack.
sentences.sContent_eng: In turn, this prevents issues concerning corrosion, as the ductile material doesn't crack.
sentences.sCn: 因此，这也避免了一些腐蚀性问题，比如一些可延展的材料不易开裂。

synos.tran: 柔软的；易教导的；[材]易延展的

phrases.pCn: 球墨铸铁，延性铁；韧性铁

remMethod.val: duct (引导) + ile (…的) → 教导他是很容易的 → 易教导的

trans.tranCn: 易延展的； 易教导的
trans.tranOther: ductile metals can be pressed or pulled into shape without needing to be heated
